summary: When the most probable serial killer suspect dies and the case looks like it's reached a dead end, police brass decide to create a killer - and anyone will do.
cast: Jung-min Hwang|Seung-bum Ryoo|Hae-Jin Yoo|Ho-jin Chun|Dong-seok Ma|Jung-kook Woo|Yeong-jin Jo|Man-sik Jeong|Sung-min Lee|Su-hyeon Kim|Bon-woong Ko|Min-Jae Kim|Hee-joon Lee|Oh Jeong-Se|Jong-goo Lee|Seung-ik Baek|Sae-byeok Song|Seo-hie Ko|Ja-hyoung Kwak|Ki-Cheon Kim|Byeong-guk Hwang|Kyoung-mi Lee|Hyun Joong Kang|Mi-do Lee|Jin-seok Kwak|Chae-eun Lee|Jin-gak Jeong|Kil-kang Ahn|Woo-Sung Choi|Dong-wook Han|Cheol-Hyeon Jo|Hwa-ryong Lee|Joon-ik Lee|Si-eun Oh|Sung Hyeon Oh|Jung-pyo Park|Seo-yeon Park
title: Boo-dang-geo-rae
